home.subtitle: Discover a youtube channel about a manifesto for a fairer, more resilient and sustainable society
home.welcome: A gateway to a new world...

intro.1: The year is 3000. Lady H Society, a historian, is investigating some missing archives: there are no traces of what happened from years 2022 to 2500.
intro.2: In 3000, humans live in peace, and have evolved enough to join the Galactic Worlds Organization.
intro.3: With this manifesto, discover Lady H's world, her investigations into our present day and into the missing archives!

2.call: Where does all this come from?
2.name: Learn more...

3.subtitle: You want to be a part of the discussion? to participate in the podcast? to provide feedback?
3.name: Reach out!

mission.subtitle: Learn more about my objectives and how this youtube channel started

comic.title: The starting point of the manifesto
comic.subtitle: Drawings by Elodie Schnitzler

obj.intro: This manifesto is a personal world view based on my experiences and these of my closed ones. It is therefore biased and bound to evolve over time and include your feedback. My objective is to remain as scientifically correct as possible, to separate facts from personnal opinions, and to welcome your contributions.

content.2: Dive into the roots of the problems
content.4: Create a community of discussions and collaborations

contact.title: Don't hesitate to reach out
contact.subtitle: To be a part of the discussion, to participate in the podcast, to provide feedback...
contact.legal: The data collected on this website include and are limited to the data you provide through the contact form. This data will never be shared outside Lady H Society. The data is stored in a secured computer for up to 2 years, for the purpose of creative development of the project. In accordance with the GDPR, you can ask to receive a copy, modify or delete your information at all time -send the request through our contact form.
